utils

Class Hash

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Hash

  • public class Hash
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for miscellaneous Hash use

    • Method Detail

      • decrypt

        public static java.lang.String decrypt(java.lang.String key,
                       java.lang.String encrypted)
                                throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Decrypts data using specific key and ciphertext
        Parameters:
        key - Encryption Key (Must be 16 Bytes)
        encrypted - Ciphertext to decrypt
        Returns:
        Plaintext decrypted from submitted ciphertext and key
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException

      • decryptUserName

        public static java.lang.String decryptUserName(java.lang.String encyptedUserName)
        Specifically decrypts encrypted user names
        Parameters:
        encyptedUserName - Encrypted user name
        Returns:
        Decrypted User name

      • decryptUserSpecificSolution

        public static java.lang.String decryptUserSpecificSolution(java.lang.String userNameKey,

                                                    throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                                           java.lang.Exception
        Throws:

      • encrypt

        public static java.lang.String encrypt(java.lang.String key,
                       java.lang.String value)
                                throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException
        Encrypts plain text into cipher text based on encryption key
        Parameters:
        key - Encryption Key (Must be 16 Bytes)
        value - Plain text to encrypt
        Returns:
        Cipher text based on plain text and key submitted
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException

      • generateUserSolution

        public static java.lang.String generateUserSolution(java.lang.String baseKey,
                                    javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cookies)
        Generates user solution based on the user name stored in their encypted cookie
        Parameters:
        baseKey - The stored result key for the module
        cookies - All of a users session cookies. The encrypted user name is pulled out from this array
        Returns:
        User Specific Solution

      • generateUserSolution

        public static java.lang.String generateUserSolution(java.lang.String baseKey,
                                    java.lang.String userSalt)
        Generates user specific solution based on the user name provided and server side encryption keys
        Parameters:
        baseKey - The stored result key for the module
        userSalt - The User Specific Encryption Salt (Based on user name)
        Returns:
        User Specific Solution

      • getCurrentSalt

        public static java.lang.String getCurrentSalt()
        This is used when encrypting/decrypting the salt. If this is bypassed characters can be lost in encryption process.
